{{cpp/chrono/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{petty|(std::chrono::month_weekday_last)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday_last/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::month_weekday_last&amp; mwdl );
}}

Outputs a textual representation of {{c|mwdl}} into {{c|os}}, as if by

{{cc|os &lt;&lt; std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L}/{:L}"),
                  mwdl.month(), mwdl.weekday_last());}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L}/{:L}")}} is {{c|"{:L}/{:L}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"{:L}/{:L}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.
